package.name: Riskkit
package.shortDescription: Unblurs NSFW/Spoilers on Reddit and Apollo

descriptionlist.description: Automatically unblurs NSFW and spoiler posts on Reddit and Apollo
Compatibility: Tested on iOS 12.x-14.2, should work on most versions tho
Reddit version: Last tested on Reddit v.2020.45.0
Apollo Version: Last tested on Apollo v.1.10.4
Should work on any version until they change how NSFW and spoiler posts work, which is unlikely
